alert.note: Alert for Livingston; Ontario (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 29 at 5:00PM EDT until August 29 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Buffalo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Livingston County in western New York... Ontario County in western New York... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 500 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Dansville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Geneva, Canandaigua, Dansville, Conesus, Phelps, Naples, Rushville, Honeoye, Gorham and Groveland. This includes the following highways... Interstate 390 between exits 4 and 5. Interstate 90 near exit 42. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
